detail_desc: Crop tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and elasticated hem.
Cycling shorts in fast-drying fabric with a wide panel with a concealed inner pocket, drawstring and D-ring at the waist. Two leg pockets, one with an extra compartment and zip. Flatlock seams.
Blouse in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Wide, tie-front collar, a V-shaped opening at the top and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs.
Rugby shirt in soft cotton jersey with a woven collar, button placket, print motif at the top and short slits in the sides. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Set in soft cotton jersey. Dress with a print motif on the front, concealed press-stud on one shoulder and long sleeves. Leggings with an elasticated waist. Elasticated hairband with a sewn-on bow.
Short, A-line skirt in cotton twill with a zip fly and button, patch front pockets and back pockets.
Elasticated hairbands with appliqués.
Bomber jacket in a cotton weave with a zip down the front, zipped sleeve pocket and flap side pockets with a press-stud. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Tailored trousers in a sturdy textured weave with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.
Velour jacket with an appliqué on the front and lined hood with sewn-on ears. Zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with a rounded hem.
Elastic scrunchies in soft velour.
Christmas tree dress in stretch jersey with tiered organza flounces and sewn-in pompoms. Opening at the back with a hook and loop fastening.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details, a racer back and a wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a tie detail at the hem.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric.

Maxi dress in a patterned weave in a narrow cut at the top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and an open back with horizontal ties. Seam with a lace trim at the waist and a concealed zip in one side. Partly lined.
Scarf in woven fabric with fringes on the short sides. Size 70x180 cm.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with a button fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Sewn-in, patterned turn-ups at the hems.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with worn details in a looser fit with a jersey panel at the waist for optimum comfort, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Trousers in a softly draping weave. High waist with pleats and a narrow tie belt, zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs.
Lightweight jacket in a cotton weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and long sleeves with a tab and button at the cuffs. Open chest pocket, and patch front pockets. Unlined.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 2.5 cm, heel 10.5 cm.
Short dress in an airy weave with flounced details. V-neck, a sewn-in wrapover at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Calf-length leather skirt. Regular waist with concealed elastication, and a raw edge hem. Unlined.
Shorts in soft, printed jersey with covered elastication and decorative bow at the waist, a small frill trim at the top and side pockets.
Warm-lined boots in suede with a zip in one side. Faux fur linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 5 cm.

Chimi x H&M. Stay on trend whether you’re poolside or on the beach. These pool shoes have a padded foot strap with smooth leatherette on the outside and soft fabric on the inside. The soles are moulded to follow the contours of your feet and the underneath is patterned for a sturdy grip. Available in two stylish colours and supplied in a transparent drawstring bag. Height of soles 3 cm.
Short, sleeveless top in soft jersey with a draped wrapover detail at the hem.

Shorts in a striped cotton weave with an extended waistband with a button, an adjustable tab and button at the sides and a zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and slim legs with creases. Slim Fit.
Short, gently tailored dungaree dress in corduroy with adjustable shoulder straps, buttons down the front, a seam at the waist and large patch front pockets.
Thin metal chain necklace with a round, hammered pendant. Adjustable length.
Sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Lined hood, low dropped shoulders, extra-long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline and print motifs front and back.
Headwear designed for a dog with an adjustable elastic strap under the chin.
Trousers in an airy weave with an adjustable, elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly with a button. Fake pockets in the side seams and jetted back pockets with a decorative button at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, pair of trousers and a hat in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist. Hat with a ribbed hem.
Metal hoop earrings in various designs. Size from 1.5 cm to 3 cm.
Straight-cut top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with flatlock seams at the cuffs.
Fitted vest top in soft jersey.
Imitation leather sandals with wrapover foot straps at the front and an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather insoles and fluted thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Straight blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and button placket. Drawstring at the sides, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cargo trousers in washed Oxford cotton with side pockets, back pockets and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud, seams at the knees and drawstring hems.

Jumper in soft, fine-knit slub cotton with a boat neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with roll edges at the cuffs. Narrow ribbing around the neckline and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton blend with an easy-iron finish, turn-down collar and classic front. Narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, a yoke and darts at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, pleated dress in an airy weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with wide buttoned cuffs, side pockets and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Trousers in soft, patterned thermal fleece with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Baby Exclusive. Dress in an organic linen weave with buttons at the back, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a gathered seam and a flared skirt. Cotton lining.
Shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Founded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Soft, non-wired lace bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage and a smocked hem. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Espadrilles in fabric and braided jute with crossover straps at the front that tie around the ankle. Fabric linings, jute insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
V-neck T-shirt in soft viscose jersey.
Vest top in slub jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front.

Wide, straight-cut blouse in a cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, dropped shoulders and long trumpet sleeves. Ties at the sides and a seam at the hem with a flounce at the front.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, 3/4-length sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
5-pocket shorts in slightly stretchy washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs. Slim fit.
Three-strand, metal necklace with round pendants. Adjustable length, 44-51 cm.

Blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a resort collar and short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Relaxed fit with buttons down the front, gathered shoulder seams, a gathered yoke at the back and ties at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Off-the-shoulder top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the top, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Padded ski mittens in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams and elasticated wrists with an adjustable hook and loop fastening. Thinsulate™ lining.The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons. Size 3-6M without thumbs.

Oversized parka in lightweight, windproof functional fabric made from recycled polyester. Hood with an elasticated drawstring, a zip down the front, and front pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with an elasticated drawstring down the sides and covered elastication at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Unlined.

Three-piece set in soft cotton jersey with a tunic, pair of leggings and matching hairband. Tunic with lace cap sleeves, a box pleat at the front and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Patterned leggings with covered elastication at the waist, and a patterned hairband with a sewn-on bow at the front.
Top in soft pile with a drawstring hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke front and back. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with a narrow elasticated edge, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Lined.

Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood and side pockets. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Striped blouse in a cotton weave with short sleeves, buttons down the front and a seam with a wide peplum at the hem.

Set with a dungaree dress and long-sleeved bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey. Dress with adjustable straps that fasten at the front, a print motif at the top and a seam that is gathered at the front and elasticated at the back of the waist. Bodysuit with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in soft ribbed jersey.

Padded bomber jacket with a print motif on the back and embroidered appliqué on the front. Detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric, a small ribbed stand-up collar and a zip down the front. Flap side pockets with a concealed press-stud, zipped arm pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Wide T-shirt in striped jersey made from a cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with beaded appliqués at the top, a turtle neck and low dropped shoulders.
